posts.title: WrestleMania Weekend
posts.description: Don't miss all the live WWE action featuring your favorite Superstars from Raw, SmackDown, NXT and 205 Live. WWE Superstarts like Roman Reigns, Charlotte Flair, Ronda Rousey, Braun Strowman, Kofi Kingston, Daniel Bryan and The Man, Becky Lynch. Check out all the upcoming shows NXT TakeOver New York and WWE Hall Of Fame Brooklyn.
posts.author: WWE & Tabile Khume

posts.title: Support WrestleTalk
posts.description: WrestleMania weekend 2019 is filled with back to back big time shows from Thursday onto the following Tuesday. The added bonus this year of New Japan Pro-Wrestling and Ring of Honor teaming up to take over the traditional WWE home of Madison Square Garden. Support WrestleTalk and stay updated on every wrestling
posts.author: Tabile Khume

posts.description: A historic night of wrestling action awaits on Saturday 6 April, as New Japan Pro Wrestling and Ring Of Honor bring their biggest and best to the Madison Square Garden arena for the G1 Supercard. This show is a major deal. Tickets sold out less than an hour after going on sale, months before a single match had been announced.
posts.author: Andrew Murray
